name: POLAROID: Lost Memories
description:
Help the robot rediscover lost memories. Find the polaroids. Avoid the enemies. Open the vault. 

Controls are AD/left and right arrow keys to move, space to jump, TAB to open the pause menu/view polaroids and W to enter the vault.

There are some small errors with the UI being an incorrect size, sorry if this doesn't work on your computer screen, it's a game maker thing.
